A Model Solutions A.1 Proof of Lemma 1 We will derive the Bayesian belief process ÃÅ½ÃÂ»t in two different ways. The first method is by applying the theorem in Liptser and Shiryaev (2013). The second one is by taking the continuous-time limit of a discrete-time process. The reason that we show the second method is because we will use the connection between discrete-time and continuous-time processes to prove the results for the diagnostic belief in Lemma 2.
